lines.text: How'd you like a platform boot up your honky ass?
Don't make me open a can of Whoop-Ass, buster!
I've been breeding boneless free-range kittens and playing cards with the cast from Valerie's Family.
I mean, this is about as interesting as-- as listening to a John Tesh album.
Next time out, Tom plays stick ball in a dildo factory.
two very large twins and the man who squeezes himself between them.
Hey, welcome back to Talk Soup. I'm ALF, desperately looking for work.
Oh, by the way, William Shatner is a very bitter man.
Well, listen, I'm ready for a comeback. So join me on the road back to greatness.... or at least cable mediocrity.
